description: The Non-Destructive Testing Certification Body at Natural Resources Canada, Hamilton has a requirement for the manufacture of up to (9) Visual Testing Plant Surveillance Assembly Units,starting with an initial quantity of three (3).
full_summary:
**23584-240601B Non-Destructive Test Specimen Tender**

* **Tender ID:** WS4337924381-DOC4414513649
* **Contract Title (English):** Non-Destructive Testing Certification Body for Natural Resources Canada
* **Contract Title (French):** Corporation de certification en essais non destructifs de Ressources naturelles Canada
* **Tender Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the production of up to nine (9) Visual Testing Plant Surveillance Assembly Units. The initial quantity required is three (3) units, with production of additional units to be done on an as-needed basis over a contract duration of 3 to 5 years.

The units will be manufactured according to detailed engineering drawings and must meet specified requirements. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to those who submitted bids in the previous solicitation.

**Key Tender Details:**

* **Publication Date:** January 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Solicited by:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is governed by the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Critical Amendments:**
Please note that the response deadline closing time has been amended to February 13, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Any bid submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Accessing the Tender Document:**
To access the full RFP and attachments, log in to your SAP Ariba account and complete your Government of Canada profile. All amendments to this RFP will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba.

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Vashti Ramnarine at vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or 289-772-7284.

**Tender Category:** Goods - Supply Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Close Date:** 2024-02-13
**Close Time:** 14:00 EST
**Project Title:** 23584-240601B Non-Destructive Testing
